{{title|std::rel_ops Symbol Index}}
{{cpp/symbol index/navbar}}

There are no identifiers available from the {{lt|cpp/standard library}} in the namespace {{c|std::rel_ops}}.

The namespace exists for automatic generation of comparison operators, and is deprecated in C++20 because of [[cpp/language/operator comparison#Three-way comparison|the three-way comparison operator]].
